search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for AskNicely (asknicely.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text:
The official pricing page for AskNicely can be found at:

**Need help choosing the right plan?**
--------------------------------------

Our team is here to help you find the perfect solution for your business. We’ve found that most midsized businesses generate between 5-15K responses per year, but we support businesses in the 100K+ range as well - we will just need some more information from you to get you an accurate quote.

FAQ

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Everything you need to know about AskNicely pricing.

**Can I upgrade my plan later?**

Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time to better fit your business needs. Simply contact our support team to make the change.

**Can I downgrade or cancel my plan at any time?**

You can cancel or downgrade your plan, but those changes will not take effect until the end of your current contract term.

**Is there a minimum contract length?**

Our plans are primarily offered on an annual basis, but we also offer discounts for extended multi-year commitments. Contact our sales team to discuss the best option for your business.

**Do you offer a free trial?**

No, we don’t offer a free trial because our solutions are highly tailored to integrate with your data feeds, processes, and secure customer data. However, we’re happy to provide a personalized demo to show how our plans can meet your specific business needs while ensuring the highest standards of security and customization.

**How do I know how many responses I'll need?**

Understanding how many responses you need is easy as it’s directly proportional to the number of surveys you need to send.  At 15% our average response rate is market leading so we’ll make sure you get plenty of feedback to understand what your customers are saying.  We can help you estimate the number of responses by evaluating your customer base and the types of surveys you plan to send. Get in touch and we can find the right plan to fit your business.

**What happens if I exceed my plan’s limits (e.g., number of responses or integrations)?**

If you exceed your plan's limits, you'll be billed for response overages. Alternatively, you can work with our team to discuss a mid-contract upgrade, which may offer additional features or volume benefits to better meet your needs.

**Are there any setup fees?**

There are no setup fees for most plans. However, for larger implementations, custom or premium integrations, there may be additional costs. Please contact our sales team for more information.

**What payment methods do you accept?**

We accept credit cards and offer invoicing options.

**What if I need help?**

All plans include chat and email support to assist you with any questions or issues. For plans exceeding $9,600/year, you'll also be assigned a named Customer Success Manager (CSM) and access to an Activation Team, ensuring personalized guidance and seamless implementation tailored to your business needs.

**How is my data handled and protected?**

We take data security very seriously. All customer data is encrypted and stored securely, and we apply industry-standard security practices including being SOC2 certified, GDPR, and CCPA compliant. For a full documentation of AskNicely’s security approach and practices see our [Cloud Security Alliance profile](https://cloudsecurityalliance.org/star/registry/asknicely/services/asknicely).

**Do you offer Single Sign-On (SSO)?**

Yes, we offer Single Sign-On (SSO) for enhanced security and streamlined access across your organization. SSO is available as an add-on for $1,500 annually.

Want to see how feedback can drive earned growth?
-------------------------------------------------

Let us show you how thousands of services businesses simplify customer experience management.
